mapper.insert: insert into users (email, nickname, password, gender, create_time, modify_time) values (#{email}, #{nickName}, #{password}, #{gender}, #{createTime}, #{modifyTime})
mapper.select: select id, email, nickname, password, gender, auth, modify_time, delete_time from users where nickname = #{nickName} and delete_time is null
